You may also be looking for Third Age 1896.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1896.

content.title: February
content.content:
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien dictates a letter to his father.
14 - E.V. Gordon, a later colleague of Tolkien, is born.
15 - Arthur Tolkien dies in Bloemfontein, as a result of a severe hemorrhage suffered the previous day. He had been sick for many months with rheumatic fever, and never made the trip to Birmingham to see his family.
? - Mabel Tolkien and her family move from Birmingham to the hamlet of Sarehole.

content.title: August
content.content: 1 - John Benjamin Tolkien, grandfather of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

content.title: October
content.content: 3 - William Morris, artist and author who influenced J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

? - James Dundas-Grant, Inkling, is born.




Years
1893 1894 1895 1896 1897 1898 1899
